name: bobmodules
title: Bob's Modules mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

Expansion to the Modules system.
Expands the 3 types of base game module to be 5 tiers, not just 3
Adjusts the bonuses each module gives, and allows you to customise them in mod settings.
Adds Pollution creating and Pollution cleaning modules, 5 tiers.
Adds Merged modules as follows:
  - Green modules offer combined efficiency and pollution cleaning bonuses, 5 tiers
 - God modules provide efficiency+speed+cleaning, with two variants that add either productivity or quality.
All recipes are completely reworked, making use of electronic components from Bob's Electronics mod.

Although it can function as a stand alone mod, it is intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
